name: SRT Subtitles Generator
description:
Process an audio or video file to generate an SRT subtitle file, using a multi-modal LLM.

You can:
- Specify a custom filename for the output SRT file (defaults to the original filename with .srt extension).
- Choose to display the full SRT content in the results (enabled by default) or just get the file path.
- Add custom instructions to tailor the subtitles.

The formats supported depend on the LLM configured in the underlying Audio LLM Processor tool.
